  |: special greets goes to washed up scenesters (wus) and imagine (i)    :|
  |. __________________                                                   .|
  |  Nils Landgren, trombone, vocals                                       |
  |  Viktoria Tolstoy, vocals                                              |
  |  Jeanette Kohn, vocals                                                 |
  |  Sharon Dyall, vocals                                                  |
  |  Ida Sandlund, vocals, piano                                           |
  |  Bugge Wesseltoft, piano                                               |
  |  Lars Danielsson, bass, cello                                          |
  |  Johan Norberg, guitar                                                 |
  |  Ulf Wakenius, guitar                                                  |
  |  Jonas Knutsson, saxophone                                             |
  |  Anders Bromander, church organ                                        |
  |  Walter Brolund Trombone Choir                                         |
  |                                                                        |
  |  Produced by, Nils Landgren.                                           |
  |                                                                        |
  |                                                                        |
  |  From instick...                                                       |
  |  "With the Christmas With My Friends concert recording a long-time     |
  |  dream come true for me. I have always wanted to preform these songs   |
  |  of joy, but in my own way and with good friends as company, being     |
  |  able to concentrate on the music without any boundaries.              |
  |      It is with great pride and happiness that I am presenting this    |
  |  christmas concert to you. It is the Christmas I dremed of as a kid    |
  |  an I kept on dreaming till I got the chance to fulfil it and now      |
  |  it&#039;s here, right infront of me and you.                               |
  |                                                                        |
  |  What we&#039;ve got is a wonderful mix of songs from medieval Europe to    |
  |  modern Christmas songs from the American tradition, something that I  |
  |  always wanted to do, at least as long as I have been in the business  |
  |  wich counts 30 years today.                                           |
  |      My friends on this recodring are simple the best ones I could     |
  |  wish for as Christmas gift. Viktoria Tolstoy, Sharon Dyall, Jeanette  |
  |  Kohn, Johan Norberg, Ulf Wakenius, jonas Knutsson, Lars Dainelsson    |
  |  and Bugge Wesseltoft, they all go way back.                           |
  |                                                                        |
  |  Ida Sandlund is my newest friend, a truly wonderful performer from    |
  |  whom you will hear more and soon!                                     |
  |                                                                        |
  |  I hope that you will enjoy our way of celebrating Christmas. Please   |
  |  do not forget why we celebrate. Let us make this world a better       |
  |  place where we all can live togheter and enjoy our time here on       |
  |  earth!                                                                |
  |                                                                        |
  |  Love, Nils"                                                           |
  |                                                                        |
  |  IDM input. This is an excellent way of making a CD. The case is in    |
  |  recycle papers and its made in a lovely way. Buy this CD from an      |
  |  artist that really is worth it. Give this as a christmas gift to yer  |
  |  family and listen to it before christmas eve =)                       |
  |                                                                        |
